NK050(wi)005:1: // gzhan stong dbu ma chen po'i lta khrid rdo rje
NK050(wi)005:2: zla ba dri ma med pa'i 'od zer zhes bya
NK050(wi)005:3: ba bzhugs so // mthar thug phyir mi ldog pa'i chos //
NK050(wi)005:4: ston dang bstan pa 'dzin mdzad rnams //
NK050(wi)005:5: snying gi thig ler bkod nas 'dir //
NK050(wi)005:6: dbu ma'i lta khrid nyung bsdus bri //
NK050(wi)005:7: de la gang nas byung ba'i khungs dang lta khrid dngos /
NK050(wi)005:8: phan yon bshad pa dang gsum mo //
NK050(wi)005:9: dang po la'ang spyi dang khyad par gnyis te /
NK050(wi)005:10: spyir rgyal ba'i bka' la bslu ba'am mi bden pa
NK050(wi)005:11: zhig yod nas drang nges kyi rnam par bzhag pa
NK050(wi)005:12: ma yin kyang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul
NK050(wi)005:13: la 'jug mi nus pa dang nus pa'i gang zag
NK050(wi)005:14: gi blo khyad la brten nas /
NK050(wi)005:15: byis pa la zas snyod pa'i tshul gyis /
NK050(wi)005:16: bka' 'khor lo dang pos 'khor ba las nges par 'byung /
NK050(wi)005:18: tha mas gnas lugs kyi don yin min sogs legs par phye bas /
NK050(wi)005:21: tha ma nges don bla med du mdo sde dgongs
NK050(wi)005:22: pa nges 'grel lung gis grub pa sogs rgyal ba
NK050(wi)005:23: sras bcas kyis rnam par bzhag pa las 'gongs mi
NK050(wi)005:25: zab mo'i don rim par gsal zhing yongs su rdzogs par mngon sum gyis kyang grub phyir ro //
NK050(wi)005:26: 'on kyang med pa la med ces kun rdzob kyi snang tshul bar pas bstan zhing /
NK050(wi)005:27: yod pa la yod ces don dam gyi stong tshul tha mas bstan pas /
NK050(wi)005:28: bar tha gnyis dang de dag gis srol 'byed shing
NK050(wi)005:29: rta chen po gnyis kyang dgongs pa'i 'bab stegs gcig
NK050(wi)005:31: de la 'khor lo tha ma nges don snying po'i mdo sde nyi shu /
NK050(wi)005:33: klu thogs yab sus kyi gzhung lugs la brten /
NK050(wi)005:34: lo ts+aa ba gzu btsan rnam gnyis nas bzung da
NK050(wi)005:35: lta'i bar du bod kyi yul 'dir yang gzhan stong
NK050(wi)005:36: dbu mar grags pa'i 'chad nyan srol ka ci rigs
NK050(wi)005:38: shing rta'i srol 'byed chen po ni //
NK050(wi)005:39: thams cad mkhyen pa rang byung rdo rje /
NK050(wi)005:41: kun mkhyen dri med 'od zer dang gsum po yin la /
NK050(wi)005:45: bstan pa'i nyin byed sogs 'phags pa'i sa la nges
NK050(wi)005:46: par bzhugs shing bstan pa yongs rdzogs kyi bshes gnyen
NK050(wi)005:47: phyogs rer ma lhungs pa'i chos kyi spyan ldan rnams
NK050(wi)005:48: kyis kyang nyan bshad sgom gsum gyis gtan la phab
NK050(wi)005:49: cing / de dag gi gsung rab thams cad 'di'i rgyab brten tu 'byon no //
NK050(wi)005:50: der ma zad thos bsam sgom pa zung 'brel gyis
NK050(wi)005:51: gnas lugs phyin ci ma log par gzigs pa'i skye
NK050(wi)005:52: 'phags rnams kyi mthar thug dgongs pa ni 'di kho
NK050(wi)005:54: khyad par zab mo'i lta khrid ni rgyud bla ma'i
NK050(wi)005:55: dgongs don mnga' bdag mee tri pas rtsal du bton
NK050(wi)005:56: te dbus kyi ka chen rin chen rdo rje dang
NK050(wi)005:57: / kha che sadz+dza na sogs brgyud pa lta khrid
NK050(wi)005:58: thun mong pa'i lugs dang byin rlabs 'pho ba'i dbang
NK050(wi)005:59: bskur gyi lam nas rje btsun lho brag pa la
NK050(wi)005:60: rtsal ba bka' brgyud yongs la grags pa'i mdo sngags
NK050(wi)005:61: zung 'jug gi phyag chen thun mong min pa dang
NK050(wi)005:62: gnyis yod pa'i snga ma ni 'dir 'chad par bya
NK050(wi)005:63: / ba nyid do // gnyis pa lta khrid dngos la'ang mdo lugs rang rkang dang /
NK050(wi)005:64: de sngags lugs zab mo dang 'brel ba'i tshul lo //
NK050(wi)005:65: dang po la'ang go bar bya ba dang /
NK050(wi)005:66: de nyams su blang ba'i tshul gnyis las dang po ni /
NK050(wi)005:67: rgyu 'bras bslu ba med pa la yid ches pa
NK050(wi)005:68: 'jig rten pa'i yang dag lta bar gsungs pa de
NK050(wi)005:70: khams gsum las 'da' bar byed pa zab mo'i lta
NK050(wi)005:71: ba phyin ci ma log pa zhig la brten dgos
NK050(wi)005:72: shing / de'ang nyan thos pas gang zag bdag med /
NK050(wi)005:73: rang rgyal bas gzung ba bden med /
NK050(wi)005:74: rnal 'byor spyod pas gnyis stong ye shes /
NK050(wi)005:75: dbu ma thun mong bas chos kun rang rang gi
NK050(wi)005:76: ngo bos stong par gtan la phab pa'i don bsgom
NK050(wi)005:77: pas nyams su myong ba yin kyang sems dang /
NK050(wi)005:78: 'du shes dang lta ba phyin ci log gsum gyis
NK050(wi)005:79: kun nas dkris pas gnyis med ye shes gtan la
NK050(wi)005:80: ma phebs par sangs rgyas dang kha thag ring ba'o
NK050(wi)005:81: // 'o na gnyis med ye shes su zhig gis nyams su myong zhe na /
NK050(wi)005:82: mtshan nyid pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis gzigs shing /
NK050(wi)005:83: rjes mthun pa so so'i skye bo thos bsam bsgom
NK050(wi)005:84: pa thun min gyis rgyud sbyangs pa rnams kyis so
NK050(wi)005:85: // phyi ma de la'ang gnyis te /
NK050(wi)005:86: ngo bo nyid med par smra ba rnams kyis /
NK050(wi)005:87: gzugs nas rnam mkhyen bar gyi chos thams cad ri
NK050(wi)005:88: bong gi rwa dang mo gsham gyi bu ltar gnas
NK050(wi)005:89: lugs la ci'ang mi dmigs shing gang du'ang ma grub
NK050(wi)005:91: rten 'brel du snang la ma 'gag par shar ba
NK050(wi)005:92: dbu ma'i rin chen lngas thag chod par byas te
NK050(wi)005:93: / dngos gzhi'i tshe gtsubs shing dang gtsubs gtan gnyis
NK050(wi)005:94: ka'ang mes bsregs nas mthar me nyid rang yal du
NK050(wi)005:95: song ba ltar zhen rtog sor rtog gis gzhal zin
NK050(wi)005:96: / nas / so sor rtog pa'i shes rab nyid kyang dmigs med du 'jog ste /
NK050(wi)005:98: gang du'ang yid la mi byed bdag med rtog pa
NK050(wi)005:99: nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang du mi bsgom pa'i tshul
NK050(wi)005:100: gyis bsgom pa na rin chen sgron ma la sogs
NK050(wi)005:101: pa'i zhi lhag zung 'jug gi ting nge 'dzin gyi
NK050(wi)005:102: sgo mang po skyes pa'i tshe /
NK050(wi)005:103: rnam par dag pa'i lung dang man ngag gis ngo
NK050(wi)005:104: legs par 'phrod na phyin ci log gi 'dzin stangs
NK050(wi)005:105: dag nas shes rab 'phar te thun mong min pa'i
NK050(wi)005:106: dbu ma chen po'i lta ba rtogs par 'gyur ro
NK050(wi)005:107: // 'on kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dam pa'i le'u las /
NK050(wi)005:108: ting nge 'dzin kyang rab brtan la //
NK050(wi)005:109: de la mngon par zhen byed na //
NK050(wi)005:110: byis pa nyer spyod pa zhes bya //
NK050(wi)005:113: rtog dpyod kyi stong nyams la chos nyid du rloms pa kha cig /
NK050(wi)005:114: dbu ma chen po ni ded kho na ltar yin gyi gzhan thams cad nor ba'o //
NK050(wi)005:116: kha cig rang gi ngo bo blo 'das su ma
NK050(wi)005:117: grol bar skye 'gag grangs su 'debs pa la phyag
NK050(wi)005:118: rgya chen por 'khrul te myong ba brtan pa'i gshis
NK050(wi)005:119: shor ba gnyis ming gi rnam dpyod che chung ma
NK050(wi)005:120: gtogs khams gsum las 'phags mi nus par mtshungs pas
NK050(wi)005:121: / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgor 'jug pa
NK050(wi)005:122: la lung rig man ngag phyin ci ma log par
NK050(wi)005:123: go myong rtogs pa rdo rus 'phrod pas kun dang
NK050(wi)005:124: / mi 'gal la / kun las 'phags pa'i lta sgom spyod pa gnad du khel ba dgos so //
NK050(wi)005:125: rnal 'byor spyod pa byams chos la brten pa dag gis ni /
NK050(wi)005:126: bka' 'khor lo bar pa'i gzhung lugs dgongs 'grel bcas
NK050(wi)005:127: pas chos can 'khrul snang glo bur ba'i spros pa
NK050(wi)005:128: gcod pa sngon du song na mchog yin zhing /
NK050(wi)005:129: de tsam spros pas mi lcogs na /
NK050(wi)005:131: rgyud bla ma tsam la ni nges par sbyod dgos la de'ang mi nus na /
NK050(wi)005:133: sems las gzhan du med pa blos rig nas //
NK050(wi)005:134: de nas sems kyang med pa nyid rtogs te //
NK050(wi)005:135: blo dang ldan pas gnyis po med rig nas //
NK050(wi)005:136: de mi ldan pa chos kyi dbyings la gnas //
NK050(wi)005:138: thog ma med pa nas rang sems ma rig pa'i
NK050(wi)005:139: cha glo bur dri ma la brten nas ma btags
NK050(wi)005:140: ma dpyad pa'i ngor rmi lam gyi 'khrul pa ltar
NK050(wi)005:142: dpyad na ci yang ma grub par rang rang gi
NK050(wi)005:143: ngo bos stong pa'i phyir snang ba thams cad ni
NK050(wi)005:144: sems kho na'i cho 'phrul yin pas /
NK050(wi)005:145: phyi don ltar shar ba'i gzung ba snang la rang
NK050(wi)005:146: bzhin med pa chu nang gi zla ba lta bu
NK050(wi)005:147: kun rdzob bden pa'i gnas lugs dang /
NK050(wi)005:148: 'dzin pa'i sems kyang phyi nang gang du'ang ma gnas
NK050(wi)005:149: shing dbyibs kha dog dngos por ma grub la med
NK050(wi)005:150: pa la yod pa ltar 'khrul pa'i bdag 'dzin gyi
NK050(wi)005:151: rgyun las byung ba'i tshogs brgyad cha dang bcas pa
NK050(wi)005:152: nam mkha'i me tog ltar gdod nas stong yang gzung
NK050(wi)005:153: 'dzin gnyis stong gi ye shes sangs rgyas nas sems
NK050(wi)005:154: can gyi bar thams cad la khyab pa'i chos nyid
NK050(wi)005:155: bde gshegs snying po rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
NK050(wi)005:156: / glo bur dri mas gdod nas gos ma myong
NK050(wi)005:157: ba don dam bden pa'i gnas lugs de nyid yang
NK050(wi)005:158: dag par ngo shes nas de'i ngang du mnyam par
NK050(wi)005:159: 'jog pa ni byams chos kyi dgongs pa ste /
NK050(wi)005:160: dpyad pa de tsam ni nges par sngon du 'gro dgos te mtha' bral du gtan la phab nas /
NK050(wi)005:161: zung 'jug nyams su len pa zhes bya ba gnas
NK050(wi)005:162: lugs gnyug ma rang byung gi ye shes su gnas
NK050(wi)005:163: / stong lugs spros pa'i mthar 'dzin pa'i rtog pas stong /
NK050(wi)005:164: rtogs lugs so sor rang rig pa'i ye shes kyis rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:165: gnyis pa nyams len dngos la sngon 'gro dngos gzhi rjes gsum mo //
NK050(wi)005:167: de'ang bde gshegs snying po yid bzhin gyi nor bu
NK050(wi)005:168: lta bu'i dri ma rags pa dang phra ba dang
NK050(wi)005:169: shin tu phra ba rnams sbyong ba'i go rim ltar
NK050(wi)005:170: 'khor lo dang po dang rjes su mthun par chos
NK050(wi)005:171: kyi mdo bzhin bsam bsgom du bya ste 'di ltar
NK050(wi)005:176: 'dus byas kyi chos 'di thams cad chu bur dang glog las kyang mi rtag /
NK050(wi)005:177: las dang nyon mongs pa'i nye bar len pa la
NK050(wi)005:178: brten nas khams gsum du gzugs sogs phung po lnga
NK050(wi)005:179: yis 'khor zhing zag pa bum par chud pa'i sbrang
NK050(wi)005:180: ma lta bu 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin
NK050(wi)005:182: sdug bsngal gyi rgya ru chud /
NK050(wi)005:183: gzugs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar kun
NK050(wi)005:184: rdzob kyi chos thams cad bden pa ma grub pas
NK050(wi)005:185: stong zhing gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bdag med pa chos
NK050(wi)005:186: thams cad kyis stong pa'i gzhi 'khrul pa glo bur
NK050(wi)005:187: ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su grub pa
NK050(wi)005:188: chen po ni rtag brtan zhi ba dam pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:189: snyam du bsams la ngag tu /
NK050(wi)005:190: 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:191: zag pa dang bcas pa ni sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK050(wi)005:192: chos thams cad ni stong zhing bdag med pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:193: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o //
NK050(wi)005:195: rgyas par lam rim rnams su 'byung ba'i thun mong
NK050(wi)005:196: gi sngon 'gro rnams rgyud la 'gre nges su bya'o
NK050(wi)005:198: dang po theg chen thun mong min pa'i lam du 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK050(wi)005:200: sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal te //
NK050(wi)005:201: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dge //
NK050(wi)005:202: sems can rnams kyi nyer len ni //
NK050(wi)005:203: mtha' dang mtha' med rnam spangs pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:204: byi dor byas pas gser mdog dang //
NK050(wi)005:205: sa le sbram dang 'khar ba dag /
NK050(wi)005:206: ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du //
NK050(wi)005:207: phung po rtsams la sems can dang //
NK050(wi)005:208: gang zag med cing phung po med //
NK050(wi)005:209: sangs rgyas ye shes zag med pa //
NK050(wi)005:210: rtag tu zhi ba rnam bsgom ste //
NK050(wi)005:211: de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
NK050(wi)005:213: sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
NK050(wi)005:214: yid la sogs pa'i nyon mongs dang //
NK050(wi)005:215: bdag dang lhan cig ldan par ni //
NK050(wi)005:216: smra ba'i mchog gis rab tu bstan //
NK050(wi)005:217: de bsal bya phyir lam mchog bsgom //
NK050(wi)005:218: zhes pa dag don dran bzhin du brjod /
NK050(wi)005:219: gnyis pa 'khor lo bar pa dang rjes su mthun
NK050(wi)005:220: par rtog med spros bral du mnyam par bzhag nas
NK050(wi)005:221: chos nyid zab mo la zlo ba ni /
NK050(wi)005:222: bde ba'i gdan la lus gnad dkyus mthun bca' /
NK050(wi)005:224: sngar thos bsam gyis lta ba gtan la pheb na /
NK050(wi)005:225: lta ba de dran par byas la mnyam par bzhag /
NK050(wi)005:226: thos bsam tshul ldan med na /
NK050(wi)005:227: rang sems 'di ci'i ngo bo yang ma grub par
NK050(wi)005:228: gtan la phab nas gang zag gi bdag med dang
NK050(wi)005:229: / yul snang thams cad rang sems kyi cha las
NK050(wi)005:230: gzhan du ma grub par thag bcad nas chos kyi
NK050(wi)005:231: / bdag med dang / de'ang sems snang dbye ba
NK050(wi)005:232: med pa chu rlabs chu las gzhan tu med pa
NK050(wi)005:233: / bdag med dang / ltar / gzung 'dzin ro mnyam du go ba bskyed nas /
NK050(wi)005:237: lung ma bstan dang btang snyoms su ma shor bar nam mkha' lta bur phyal gyis bzhag pas /
NK050(wi)005:238: mi sdod pa 'gyu na tshogs drug gi snang ba gang shar stong pa nyid yin pas /
NK050(wi)005:239: spang blang re dogs dgag bsgrub gang yang mi byed par rang zhi rang grol du skyong ba na /
NK050(wi)005:240: sems gnas kyi rtags rim par 'byung /
NK050(wi)005:241: de nas khrid gzhung rnams las 'byung ba ltar sems
NK050(wi)005:242: tshol byas pas rang bzhin gdod nas spros pa dang
NK050(wi)005:243: bral ba la thag chod skye zhing /
NK050(wi)005:244: gnas lugs spros bral de la ngo shes gcig pu
NK050(wi)005:245: ma gtogs logs su bsgom rgyu med pas 'bral med
NK050(wi)005:247: de'ang ma bcos so ma dang /
NK050(wi)005:248: gang shar gnyug mar gsungs pas rang sems gsal stong
NK050(wi)005:249: 'dzin med de nyid gnas 'gyu dga' sdug ci ltar
NK050(wi)005:250: shar ba de ka ma bcos par skyong ba las
NK050(wi)005:251: spang bya dang gnyen po'i rtsol bas mi 'chings par
NK050(wi)005:252: rten med rig pa sgom med du 'jog pas theg
NK050(wi)005:253: chen zhi lhag mthar phyin pa 'byung ste /
NK050(wi)005:254: de dag gi skabs su nyams kyi 'char sgo dang /
NK050(wi)005:255: lam gyi yon tan ji ltar skyes kyang ma chags
NK050(wi)005:256: shing ma zhen par rang ngo shes par bya ba
NK050(wi)005:257: ni zab mo'o // ngag tu yang /
NK050(wi)005:261: zhes brjod cing don dran par bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:263: zhi lhag gi ting nge 'dzin ci rigs skyes pa
NK050(wi)005:264: na 'khor lo tha ma dang rdo rje theg pa'i
NK050(wi)005:265: rjes su mthun par yod med la sogs pa'i shan
NK050(wi)005:266: legs par phye zhing ngo sprad pa ni /
NK050(wi)005:267: gsung rab gzhung 'grel rnams la go ba rags rim yod na de kas mthus la /
NK050(wi)005:268: med na ri chos nges don rgya mtsho tsam zhig lung 'bogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:269: lta rtogs ci nus su byas pas sems kyi ngo
NK050(wi)005:270: bo rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid rang
NK050(wi)005:271: bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
NK050(wi)005:272: po de bzhin nyid dang stong pa nyid dang phyag
NK050(wi)005:273: rgya chen mo dang a ha la sogs mtshan gyi
NK050(wi)005:274: rnam grangs du mas bstan yang 'gal 'dus skyon gyis
NK050(wi)005:275: ma rig par khong du chud nas /
NK050(wi)005:277: sangs rgyas kyi gsung thams cad las ni stong pa nyid dang bdag med pa ston to //
NK050(wi)005:278: stong pa nyid dang bdag med pa'i don mi shes
NK050(wi)005:279: pa'i mi blun po rnams ni nyams par 'gyur ro
NK050(wi)005:280: // zhes pa'i skyon las grol te bden pa gnyis
NK050(wi)005:281: dang rton pa bzhi la brten nas rgyal ba'i gsung
NK050(wi)005:282: rab nges don mthar thug pa rnams dang rang gi
NK050(wi)005:283: nyams su myang bya'i ye shes brda 'phrod de lam
NK050(wi)005:284: bsgom pa don yod par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)005:285: de ltar kun brtags glo bur ba'i sems kyis bsdus
NK050(wi)005:286: pa'i chos thams cad sprin gyi 'du 'god ltar stong
NK050(wi)005:287: yang / chos nyid bde gshegs snying po gsal rig
NK050(wi)005:288: rgyun chad med pa nyid rang byung gi ye shes
NK050(wi)005:289: su ngo 'phrod nas nyams su blang ba ni /
NK050(wi)005:291: rje btsun sgrol ba'i mgon po'i gsung rab las 'byung
NK050(wi)005:292: ba ltar bla ma sangs rgyas rjes dran thun gcig
NK050(wi)005:293: bsgoms la mthar / de bzhin gshegs pa ni bstan du med pa ste /
NK050(wi)005:294: de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus so //
NK050(wi)005:295: chos ni brjod du med pa ste /
NK050(wi)005:296: de ni rna bas mnyan par mi nus so //
NK050(wi)005:297: dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa ste /
NK050(wi)005:298: de ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba mi nus so //
NK050(wi)005:300: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni 'dus ma byas pas ni rtag pa zhes bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:301: nam mkha' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin no //
NK050(wi)005:302: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:303: de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:308: 'dus ma byas pa ni rtag pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:310: don dam gyi dkon mchog gsum rtag tu rjes su dran par bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:311: de nas lang+kara gshegs pa las /
NK050(wi)005:312: sems tsam la ni brten nas su //
NK050(wi)005:313: phyi rol don du mi brtag go //
NK050(wi)005:314: snang ba med pa la brten nas //
NK050(wi)005:315: sems tsam las ni 'da' bar bya //
NK050(wi)005:316: yang dag dmigs pa la brten nas //
NK050(wi)005:317: snang ba med las 'da' bar bya //
NK050(wi)005:318: rnal 'byor snang med la gnas na //
NK050(wi)005:319: theg pa chen po mi mthong ngo //
NK050(wi)005:320: zhes kun rdzob 'khrul pa sems tsam du rtogs pa de snang med dbu mas gzhig cing /
NK050(wi)005:321: de las kyang 'das nas snang bcas dbu mas de
NK050(wi)005:322: kho na nyid kyi tshul ma nor ba la 'jug
NK050(wi)005:323: dgos / de la yang dag pa'i dmigs pa gang zhe na /
NK050(wi)005:324: nam mkhas ma khyab pa'i 'byung ba bzhi med pa
NK050(wi)005:325: ltar sangs rgyas kyi skus ma khyab pa'i shes bya
NK050(wi)005:326: med pa dang / sangs rgyas dang /
NK050(wi)005:328: sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la bzang
NK050(wi)005:329: ngan che chung mtho dman la sogs pa'i dbye ba
NK050(wi)005:330: med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos skyed par nus pa /
NK050(wi)005:331: thog ma med pa'i dus can /
NK050(wi)005:332: chos nyid kyis thob pa rang bzhin gnas pa'i rigs
NK050(wi)005:333: sam khams de nyid srog dbugs kyis bsdus pa'i skye
NK050(wi)005:334: 'gro thams cad la yod pas sems can thams cad
NK050(wi)005:335: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no //
NK050(wi)005:337: rdzogs sangs sku ni 'phro phyir dang //
NK050(wi)005:338: de bzhin nyid dbyer med phyir dang //
NK050(wi)005:339: rigs yod phyir na lus can kun //
NK050(wi)005:340: rtag tu sangs rgyas snying po can //
NK050(wi)005:342: dag pa rnams kyi chos sku /
NK050(wi)005:343: ma dag cing dag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid /
NK050(wi)005:344: ma dag pa rnams kyi rigs de nyid tshul 'di ltar du yod /
NK050(wi)005:345: sangs rgyas pad ngan sbrang rtsi sbrang ma la //
NK050(wi)005:346: sbun la snying po mi gtsang nang na gser //
NK050(wi)005:347: sa la gter dang myug sogs 'bras chung dang //
NK050(wi)005:348: gos hrul nang na rgyal ba'i sku dang ni //
NK050(wi)005:349: bud med ngan ma'i lto na mi bdag dang //
NK050(wi)005:350: sa la rin chen gzugs yod ji lta bar //
NK050(wi)005:351: glo bur nyon mongs dri mas bsgribs pa yi //
NK050(wi)005:352: sems can rnams la de bzhin khams 'di gnas //
NK050(wi)005:354: las dang rgyu dang 'bras bu dang /
NK050(wi)005:355: rnam par smin pa dang nyon mongs pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:356: phung khams skye mched rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
NK050(wi)005:357: sogs rnam par dbye ba can thams cad don dam
NK050(wi)005:358: du yod ma myong bar ma zad /
NK050(wi)005:359: kun rdzob tu'ang ldan la ma gos pa bzhugs shing /
NK050(wi)005:360: rang byung gi mtshan dpe stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:361: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa gsum dang /
NK050(wi)005:362: byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang /
NK050(wi)005:363: rdo rje lta bu la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK050(wi)005:364: chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i ye shes tshad med
NK050(wi)005:365: pa sogs rnam par dbyer med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK050(wi)005:366: chos gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed las lhag pa
NK050(wi)005:367: ni gdod nas rang chas su bzhugs pas mi stong
NK050(wi)005:368: ngo zhes dri ma 'bral rung dang /
NK050(wi)005:369: yon tan skye rung gi gzhi la yid ches pas /
NK050(wi)005:370: rnam dbyer bcas pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK050(wi)005:371: glo bur dag gis khams stong gi //
NK050(wi)005:372: rnam dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid can //
NK050(wi)005:373: bla med chos kyis stong ma yin //
NK050(wi)005:374: 'od gsal byas min dbyer med pa //
NK050(wi)005:376: rdul las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi //
NK050(wi)005:377: chos rnams kun dang ldan pa nyid //
NK050(wi)005:379: de'ang nyan thos dang rang rgyal la sogs pas ni bde ba la sdug bsngal /
NK050(wi)005:380: rtag pa la mi rtag pa /
NK050(wi)005:382: gtsang ba la mi gtsang bar lta ste rgyal bas
NK050(wi)005:383: gsungs pa'i chi ga shes kyi don ni mi shes
NK050(wi)005:384: so // de la don ni 'di lta ste /
NK050(wi)005:385: bdag med pa ni 'khor ba zhes bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:386: bdag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:387: mi rtag pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas so //
NK050(wi)005:388: rtag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'o //
NK050(wi)005:389: sdug bsngal ba ni mu stegs can thams cad do //
NK050(wi)005:390: bde ba ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:391: yongs su ma dag pa ni 'dus byas kyi chos so //
NK050(wi)005:392: yongs su dag pa ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub
NK050(wi)005:393: sems dpa' rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos te rang
NK050(wi)005:394: gi sems nyid bde gshegs snying po ni phyin ci
NK050(wi)005:395: log las 'das pa yang dag pa'i chos bzhi po
NK050(wi)005:396: 'di dang ldan no snyam du bsams la /
NK050(wi)005:397: de ni rang bzhin dag phyir dang //
NK050(wi)005:398: bag chags spang phyir gtsang ba yin //
NK050(wi)005:399: bdag dang bdag med spros pa dag /
NK050(wi)005:400: nye bar zhi ba dam pa'i bdag /
NK050(wi)005:401: yid kyi rang bzhin phung po dang //
NK050(wi)005:402: de rgyu log phyir bde ba nyid //
NK050(wi)005:404: mnyam pa nyid du rtogs phyir rtag /
NK050(wi)005:406: de lta bu'i khyad gzhi bde gshegs snying po /
NK050(wi)005:407: khyad chos sangs rgyas kyi bral ba'i yon tan du
NK050(wi)005:408: ma dang bcas pa da lta rang rig pa'i ye
NK050(wi)005:409: shes gsal la ma 'gag pa gnyug ma lhan cig
NK050(wi)005:410: skyes pa thos bsam bsgom gsum gyis nyams su myong
NK050(wi)005:411: ba 'di nyid sbyang gzhir bzhugs pa la /
NK050(wi)005:412: sbyang bya glo bur ba'i dri ma dag nas /
NK050(wi)005:413: sbyangs 'bras rang la bzhugs pa'i gnas lugs de nyid
NK050(wi)005:414: mngon du gyur pa ni dri bral chos sku zhes
NK050(wi)005:415: btags te / 'khor 'das kun gyi rnam pa thams
NK050(wi)005:416: cad par 'char yang shar tsam nyid nas gzhi las
NK050(wi)005:417: ma g.yos pa dri ma med pa'i shel gong la
NK050(wi)005:418: gzugs brnyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs su snang yang
NK050(wi)005:419: btags te / / snang tsam nyid nas shel dang gzugs brnyan ma 'dres pa ltar /
NK050(wi)005:420: rang rig gsal stong rjen par bud pa la 'khor
NK050(wi)005:421: 'das lam gsum gyi snang ba ci ltar shar yang
NK050(wi)005:422: rang shar rang grol ngo bo la nam yang gos
NK050(wi)005:423: pa med pas lta ba dang nyes pa'i bag chags
NK050(wi)005:424: bsal bar bya ba ci'ang med cing /
NK050(wi)005:425: sngar med kyi khyad chos gsar du ci'ang bsnan ma
NK050(wi)005:426: dgos par 'phags pa'i ye shes stong pa nyid la
NK050(wi)005:427: mnyam bzhag gi dngos gzhir byas nas thun ci rigs
NK050(wi)005:428: su bsgom zhing skabs su rdo rje'i tshig gis gsal
NK050(wi)005:429: gdab pa ni / 'di la bsal bya ci yang med /
NK050(wi)005:430: gzhag par bya ba cung zad med //
NK050(wi)005:431: yang dag nyid la yang dag lta //
NK050(wi)005:432: yang dag mthong na rnam par grol //
NK050(wi)005:434: 'di dag kyang rje btsun sgrol mgon zhabs kyis /
NK050(wi)005:435: rang bzhin bde gshegs snying po bsgom pa dang //
NK050(wi)005:436: khyad chos rgyal ba'i yon tan bsam pa gnyis //
NK050(wi)005:437: rnam rtog bral ba'i yid kyis 'og bsdus na //
NK050(wi)005:438: de ni nges don bde gshegs lam mchog yin //
NK050(wi)005:439: zhes zab gnad du gdams par mdzad pa de yin no //
NK050(wi)005:440: de ltar mnyam par bzhag nas mthar //
NK050(wi)005:441: ji ltar sngar bzhin phyis de bzhin //
NK050(wi)005:442: 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid do //
NK050(wi)005:443: zhes gsungs pa ltar rang la gdod nas rang chas
NK050(wi)005:444: su bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs snying po rang bzhin 'od
NK050(wi)005:446: yang dag pa'i lta sgom gyis glo bur dri ma
NK050(wi)005:447: bcom nas rang zhal mngon du gyur pa na mngon
NK050(wi)005:448: par rdzogs pa byang chub pa zhes 'bras bu'i ming
NK050(wi)005:450: rgyu lam de dang ldan pa la yid ches kyi nges shes bskyed de /
NK050(wi)005:451: rang bzhin 'od gsal zhes brjod gang yin nyi dang mkha' bzhin glo bur gyi /
NK050(wi)005:452: nyon mongs shes bya'i sprin tshogs stug po'i sgrib pa yis ni bsgribs gyur pa /
NK050(wi)005:453: dri med sangs rgyas yon tan kun ldan rtag brtan g.yung drung sangs rgyas nyid /
NK050(wi)005:454: de ni chos la mi rtog rnam 'byed ye shes dag la brten nas 'thob /
NK050(wi)005:455: thog ma dbus mtha' med cing rnam dbyer med //
NK050(wi)005:456: gnyis med gsum bral dri med rnam rtog med //
NK050(wi)005:457: chos dbyings rang bzhin gang yin rtag gnas pa //
NK050(wi)005:458: mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor pa yis mthong //
NK050(wi)005:459: zhes nges pa'i shes pa bskyed nas mnyam bzhag las sdang ste /
NK050(wi)005:460: gsum pa rjes thob thun mtshams kyi bya ba la 'jug pa na /
NK050(wi)005:461: snying po'i man ngag legs par 'doms pa'i bla ma la chos sku'i mos gus dang /
NK050(wi)005:462: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
NK050(wi)005:463: can yin pas gnas skabs rang ngo 'phrod ma gtogs
NK050(wi)005:464: mthar thug yon tan drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid
NK050(wi)005:465: can du shes pa'i dag snang rab 'byams dang /
NK050(wi)005:466: de ltar ma rtogs pa'i skye 'gro mtha' dag pha
NK050(wi)005:467: mar ma gyur pa gcig kyang med pa'i 'khrul snang
NK050(wi)005:468: lu gu brgyud du 'phyan pas sdug bsngal gyi 'khor
NK050(wi)005:469: lo 'ba' zhig pa bskor ba la mi bzod pa'i
NK050(wi)005:470: snying rje dang / de ltar na sems can thams
NK050(wi)005:471: cad rang rang gi gzhi la bzhugs pa'i bral 'bras
NK050(wi)005:472: chos sku mngon du thob pa'i phyir theg chen smon
NK050(wi)005:473: 'jug gi sems bskyed dang ldan pas rang gzhan gyi
NK050(wi)005:474: mi dge cha dang bcas pa gdod nas stong nyid
NK050(wi)005:475: du rtogs pa'i sgo nas spang ba dang /
NK050(wi)005:476: nga rgyal dang rloms sems bral bas sbyin sogs pha
NK050(wi)005:477: rol tu phyin pa phyogs su gtogs pa bcas dge
NK050(wi)005:478: ba ci 'grub tu bsgrub pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:479: bdag dang sems can du mngon par ma zhen pa'i
NK050(wi)005:480: sgo nas dngos dang brgyud du sems can la phan
NK050(wi)005:481: ci thogs lag len du gdab pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:482: kun brtags kyis bsdus pa'i phyi nang rten 'brel gyi
NK050(wi)005:483: chos thams cad snang yang bden pa'i ngo bos stong
NK050(wi)005:484: pa rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa
NK050(wi)005:485: dang / khyad par du bsod nams ma bsags pa
NK050(wi)005:486: la log par lta ba la sogs pa'i nyes dmigs
NK050(wi)005:488: yang dag pa'i lta ba rtogs par byed pa la tshogs bsags dgos par gsungs pas /
NK050(wi)005:489: kha na ma tho ba dang bral zhing theg chen
NK050(wi)005:490: sems bskyed kyis zin pa'i dge ba'i las su 'gyur
NK050(wi)005:491: ba spyi dang / phyag bskor s+aats+tsha mar me phul
NK050(wi)005:492: ba yan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mthong
NK050(wi)005:493: ba'i rgyu ru bsngo ba dang /
NK050(wi)005:494: dkon mchog gsum rtag pa la yid ches pas rten
NK050(wi)005:495: bzhengs mchod bstod sogs mnyes pa bsgrub pa spyi dang
NK050(wi)005:496: / khyad par yan lag bdun pa grangs su ma bcad par ci nus 'bul /
NK050(wi)005:497: skabs skabs su nges don snying po'i mdo sde nyi shu lung 'bogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:498: kha ton du bgyid pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:501: ri chos nges don rgya mtsho sogs dgongs 'grel tshad ldan rnams la'ang rtog pa bcug ste /
NK050(wi)005:502: thos bsam gyis bsgom pa ma 'phrog cing /
NK050(wi)005:503: bsgom pos thos bsam ma bcom par rang bzhin gnas
NK050(wi)005:504: rigs mngon du 'gyur ba'i phyir mnyam bzhag ye shes
NK050(wi)005:505: kyi tshogs dang / rgyas 'gyur gyi rigs gong du
NK050(wi)005:506: spel ba'i phyir rjes thob bsod nams kyi tshogs zung
NK050(wi)005:508: zab mo'i gnas lugs phyin ci ma log par rtogs
NK050(wi)005:509: pa'i shes rab cung zad cig skyes kyang 'dus byas
NK050(wi)005:510: kyi dge ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa las kyang
NK050(wi)005:511: sa chod de che bas mnyam bzhag gtso bor bton
NK050(wi)005:512: / ting nge 'dzin ltar snang skyes pa las ni
NK050(wi)005:513: rgyal ba'i gsung rab rnam par dag pa thos bsam
NK050(wi)005:514: byung na phugs kyi gzhan don de che stabs brgya
NK050(wi)005:515: 'gyur stong 'gyur gyis lhag pas gcig go gcig gis
NK050(wi)005:517: spyod lam kun tu dran pa dang shes bzhin mi
NK050(wi)005:518: 'bral bar byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis kyis
NK050(wi)005:519: zin par bya / nam zhig 'chi ba'i tshe kun
NK050(wi)005:520: mkhyen dol po pa'i 'pho ba'i man ngag khyad du
NK050(wi)005:521: 'phags pa ltar rnam shes gzhi'i 'od gsal la 'jug
NK050(wi)005:522: pa'i tshul lag tu thebs dgos pas da lta nas
NK050(wi)005:523: zin par bya / goms 'dris bya / de lta
NK050(wi)005:524: na rnal 'byor pa'i rig pa rnams kun mchog ldan
NK050(wi)005:525: gyi stong pa nyid 'od gsal ba la thim pas
NK050(wi)005:526: zin par bya / goms 'dris bya / / gdod
NK050(wi)005:527: nas bzhugs pa'i chos kyi sku glo bur dri ma'i
NK050(wi)005:529: shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa'i sku dang
NK050(wi)005:530: ye shes yon tan mdzad pa phun sum tshogs shing
NK050(wi)005:531: tshad med gzhal du med pa'i bdag nyid nam mkha'
NK050(wi)005:533: nor bu dpag bsam gyi shing ltar sems can rnams kyi 'dod dgu'i 'byung gnas su gyur te /
NK050(wi)005:534: 'khor ba ji srid rtag khyab lhun grub kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi chad du 'byung bar 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)005:535: de ltar myur du 'grub pa'i phyir bzang po spyod pa sogs theg chen bsngo smon spyi dang /
NK050(wi)005:536: 'adi'ang thun mtshams su gdab par bya ste /
NK050(wi)005:537: sangs rgyas las chos chos las 'phags pa'i tshogs /
NK050(wi)005:538: tshogs las snying po ye shes khams thob ma thag ye shes de thob byang chub mchog chos sogs /
NK050(wi)005:539: sems can don byed chos rnams dang ldan shog /
NK050(wi)005:540: rang don gzhan don don dam sku dang ni //
NK050(wi)005:541: de la brten pa'i kun rdzob sku nyid de //
NK050(wi)005:542: bral dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yi //
NK050(wi)005:543: yon tan drug cu rtsa bzhi myur thob shog /
NK050(wi)005:544: gdul bya'i khams dang 'dul ba'i thabs dang ni //
NK050(wi)005:545: gdul bya'i khams kyi 'dul ba'i bya ba dang //
NK050(wi)005:546: de yi yul dang dus su gshegs pa la //
NK050(wi)005:547: khyab rtag lhun gyis grub par 'jug par shog /
NK050(wi)005:548: dkon mchog rnam par byang khams dri med byang chub yon tan phrin las te /
NK050(wi)005:549: don gnas rnam bdun thos bsam bsgom las bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa /
NK050(wi)005:550: des ni 'gro 'dis mtha' yas 'od mnga' drang srong tshe dpag med mthong zhing /
NK050(wi)005:551: mthong nas kyang ni chos mig dri med skyes te byang chub mchog thob shog /
NK050(wi)005:552: ces re dogs med pa'i smon lam dang /
NK050(wi)005:553: 'khor gsum mi rtog pa'i bsngo bas rgyas 'debs par bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:554: gnyis pa lta ba de nyid sngags dang 'brel bar
NK050(wi)005:555: nyams su len pa'i tshe na'ang go bar bya rgyu
NK050(wi)005:556: dang dngos gzhi gnyis las dang po /
NK050(wi)005:557: phyi 'jig rten snod bcud srid pa gsum gyi rnam
NK050(wi)005:558: par shar ba 'di dag bzhin gyi byad me long
NK050(wi)005:560: nang rtsa rlung thig le'i cho 'phrul du shar ba
NK050(wi)005:561: yin zhing de gsum yang gzhan mchog dkyil 'khor gyi
NK050(wi)005:562: 'khor lo rten dang brten par bcas pa'i rnam par
NK050(wi)005:563: bzhugs la / de thams cad kyang /
NK050(wi)005:564: de kho na nyid bde gshegs snying po'i rang 'od
NK050(wi)005:565: rang mdangs chos kyi sku nyid rnam pa thams cad
NK050(wi)005:566: par shar ba mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes
NK050(wi)005:567: / don dam chos kyi dbyings bde stong zung 'jug
NK050(wi)005:568: rang bzhin 'gyur ba med la rgyun mi chad pas
NK050(wi)005:569: rgyud kyi don du gsungs shing /
NK050(wi)005:570: de'ang gzhi'i gnas skabs dri bcas de bzhin nyid la rgyu'i rgyud dang /
NK050(wi)005:571: lam dus chos nyid kyi don rim par snang bas lam thabs kyi rgyud dang /
NK050(wi)005:572: dag pa gnyis ldan mngon du 'gyur ba na shin tu rnam dag 'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya ste /
NK050(wi)005:573: lta ba thun mong ma yin pa de nyid kun
NK050(wi)005:574: rdzob kyi stong tshul la mchog tu 'dzin pa rnams
NK050(wi)005:575: kyis phyogs tsam mi mthong ba lta ci smos /
NK050(wi)005:576: gong smos mdo lugs rang rkang gi lam des kyang yun ring por 'gor ba yin pas /
NK050(wi)005:577: dbang dang dam tshig gis khyad par du byas pa'i
NK050(wi)005:578: sngags kyi lam mtha' dag las khyad par du 'phags
NK050(wi)005:579: pa rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yan lag drug la mnyam
NK050(wi)005:580: par bzhag pa na dus thung ngur tsheg chung ngus
NK050(wi)005:581: bde blag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no //
NK050(wi)005:582: gnyis pa dngos gzhi nyams su len na /
NK050(wi)005:584: ji ltar me ni shing la rtag gnas kyang //
NK050(wi)005:585: gcang dang dbye ba'i thabs kyis mi mthong ste //
NK050(wi)005:586: gtsubs shing gtsubs gtan lag pas bsrubs pa las //
NK050(wi)005:587: de la gnas pa yang ni mthong bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)005:588: de bzhin sems kyi 'od gsal rtog pa yi //
NK050(wi)005:589: bsgom pa'i thabs rnams dag gis mi mthong ste //
NK050(wi)005:590: de nyid du ni rkyang ma dag dang ni //
NK050(wi)005:591: ro ma gcig tu sbyor bas mthong bar 'gyur //
NK050(wi)005:593: rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de nyid /
NK050(wi)005:594: ngo bo'i cha nas rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid dang /
NK050(wi)005:595: rang bzhin mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen por bzhugs la /
NK050(wi)005:596: de ni rtog bcas kyi bsgom pa sna tshogs pas kyang mi mthong la /
NK050(wi)005:597: rnam par ma rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK050(wi)005:598: byed pa bcings pa'i thabs khyad par can gyis pra phab pa'i gzugs brnyan ltar mthong bar 'gyur bas /
NK050(wi)005:599: thog mar sor sdud dang bsam gtan la brten 'dun pa'i rnal 'byor gyis /
NK050(wi)005:603: mar me'i mtshan ma mthong la /
NK050(wi)005:604: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' nyin mo'i rnal 'byor gyis /
NK050(wi)005:609: mchog gi cha ste glog dang thig le'i bar du
NK050(wi)005:610: rtags bcu yongs su rdzogs pa'i stong gzugs de dag
NK050(wi)005:611: yul du byas nas nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par
NK050(wi)005:612: bzhag pas rnam pa thams cad pa'i stong pa nyid
NK050(wi)005:613: khams gsum pa'i rnam pa mtha' dag can du shar
NK050(wi)005:615: de nas srog rtsol dang 'dzin pa'i yan lag la brten zhu bde drangs /
NK050(wi)005:616: rjes dran dang ting nge 'dzin gyis mchog tu mi
NK050(wi)005:617: 'gyur ba'i bde ba mthar thug pa bsgrubs 'pho ba'i
NK050(wi)005:618: bag chags kyi dbugs bkag pas kun rdzob kyi 'phrul
NK050(wi)005:620: dag pa'i snang ba gzhom du med pa mtha' dang mu med par mched de /
NK050(wi)005:621: gtsang bdag bde dang rtag pa'i pha rol du son
NK050(wi)005:622: pa dri bral chos sku mkha' khyab dang po'i sangs
NK050(wi)005:623: rgyas gdod nas rang la bzhugs pa de nyid mngon
NK050(wi)005:624: du 'gyur ro // de dag gi skabs su grogs
NK050(wi)005:625: dam tshig dang spyod pa rnam par dag pa dgos
NK050(wi)005:626: shing de'i tshul ni chos rje yab sras kyi gsung
NK050(wi)005:627: du 'gyur ro // dang / bla ma'i man ngag
NK050(wi)005:628: ltar khong du chud nas rtse gcig tu bsgom par
NK050(wi)005:629: du 'gyur ro // dang / bya'o // gsum pa phan yon ni /
NK050(wi)005:630: de'ang rtsod pa'i mthar snyigs ma lnga bdo bas lta ba'i snyigs ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'byung la /
NK050(wi)005:631: sems can bsod nams chung bas nges don snying po'i mdo sde rnams la mi gus shing /
NK050(wi)005:632: de dag las gsungs pa'i don mi bsgom par snyom las su byed pa ma zad /
NK050(wi)005:633: kha cig snying po'i mdo sde rnams la yid mi
NK050(wi)005:634: ches pas log par lta ba'i rgyu des ngan 'gro'i
NK050(wi)005:635: g.yang sa chen por lhungs te thar pa'i dbyangs thag
NK050(wi)005:637: de las ldog pa ni phan yon yin la /
NK050(wi)005:641: khyad par du 'phags par bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa las /
NK050(wi)005:642: zab mo'i chos 'di thos pa'i phan yon che ba rgyud bla mar gsungs shing /
NK050(wi)005:643: spyir theg chen la mos pa'i phan yon ni mdo las /
NK050(wi)005:644: gang la las zhig theg pa chen po mos pa
NK050(wi)005:645: rab tu skyed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa
NK050(wi)005:646: stong phrag gcig tu ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur
NK050(wi)005:647: ro // bskal pa stong phrag lngar byol song dang yi dwags su mi skye /
NK050(wi)005:648: bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lngar lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)005:651: gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK050(wi)005:652: pa thos nas shes 'phos na sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK050(wi)005:654: nam 'tsho'i bar du sems can thams cad la bde
NK050(wi)005:655: ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bskur ba dang
NK050(wi)005:656: / thos pa bskal pa'i bar du byed pa las /
NK050(wi)005:657: tha na se gol gtogs pa'i yun tsam sher phyin bsgoms pa bsod nams che bar gsungs /
NK050(wi)005:658: khyad par mdo sde dgongs pa nges 'grel las sen
NK050(wi)005:659: mo'i rdul dang ba lang gi rmig rjes kyi ni
NK050(wi)005:661: rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu dang bskrun na brgya stong 'bum gyi cha dang /
NK050(wi)005:662: dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do //
NK050(wi)005:663: de bzhin du drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la
NK050(wi)005:664: mos pa nas sgom pa'i rnam pa la sbyor bar
NK050(wi)005:665: byed pa'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi rnam pa gang
NK050(wi)005:667: nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la mos shing bsgoms
NK050(wi)005:668: pa'i bsod nams kyi char yang mi nye dpe dang
NK050(wi)005:669: rgyur yang mi bzod par gsungs /
NK050(wi)005:671: nga ni mya ngan 'das phyi nas //
NK050(wi)005:672: mi yi nang nas la la zhig /
NK050(wi)005:673: sems can rnam pa thams cad la //
NK050(wi)005:674: bde gshegs snying po yod do zhes //
NK050(wi)005:675: mos pa rnam dag byed nus na //
NK050(wi)005:676: sangs rgyas bka' drin 'tshob pa yin //
NK050(wi)005:679: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par byed pa
NK050(wi)005:680: de ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am nyon mongs
NK050(wi)005:681: pa med pa / med pa'am su yang rung ste rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:683: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag pa sems can
NK050(wi)005:684: thams cad la yod par shes pa'i rgyus 'jig rten
NK050(wi)005:685: na bde ba'i rnam pa mchog rnams dang phun sum
NK050(wi)005:686: tshogs pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad rnyed par
NK050(wi)005:687: 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po rtag
NK050(wi)005:688: pa thos pas dus gsum du'ang phun sum tshogs pa
NK050(wi)005:689: 'gyur ro // thams cad dang / mtho ris dang
NK050(wi)005:690: sa steng gi bde ba thams cad rtag tu thob
NK050(wi)005:692: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thos pa'i bsod nams kyis rgyus /
NK050(wi)005:696: 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)005:697: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa brtan pa g.yung drung ther zug ste /
NK050(wi)005:698: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'chi ba
NK050(wi)005:699: med par thos pas thams cad 'byor zhing yun ring
NK050(wi)005:700: du sra ba dang brtan par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)005:703: sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying
NK050(wi)005:704: po yod do zhes ston par byed pa'i sems can
NK050(wi)005:705: de dag ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang
NK050(wi)005:706: ldan pa ste / dam pa'i chos 'dod pa'i rigs
NK050(wi)005:707: kyi bu de dag ni sdig pa'i las grangs med
NK050(wi)005:708: pa byas pa rnams klad pa na ba dang /
NK050(wi)005:710: zug rngu dang skur pa btab pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)005:712: de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag pa'i chos can du
NK050(wi)005:713: yid ches na gang zag de ni me tog u
NK050(wi)005:714: dum+ba ra ltar shin tu dkon pa'o //
NK050(wi)005:716: gang gis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu
NK050(wi)005:717: zab mo 'di thos nas dad pa'i sems skyes na
NK050(wi)005:718: / de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bskal pa
NK050(wi)005:719: rgya stong gi bar du ngan song du ltung bar
NK050(wi)005:722: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rtag go //
NK050(wi)005:723: dam pa'i chos nus par mi 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)005:725: snyam du shes pa la brtson par byas na /
NK050(wi)005:726: de dag kyang nga dang 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi gnas su blta bar bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:728: dper na nyi ma shar na lho 'ur med par
NK050(wi)005:729: 'gyur ba bzhin du snying po'i mdo 'di thos pa
NK050(wi)005:730: tsam gyis phas pham pa dang /
NK050(wi)005:731: mtshams med pa'i sdig pa'i phung po myur du byang bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK050(wi)005:733: gzhan gyis byed du bcug pa'am /
NK050(wi)005:734: rnyed bkur tshigs su bcad pa'i don du yang rung /
NK050(wi)005:735: bdag la byang chub mi dgos snyam nas sems ma
NK050(wi)005:736: skyed kyang snying po'i mdo 'di thos pa tsam gyis
NK050(wi)005:737: de'i lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad du
NK050(wi)005:738: byang chub kyi rgyu sos ka'i nyi rdul bzhin du
NK050(wi)005:739: 'jug pa dang / sngon sangs rgyas gang g+aa'i klung
NK050(wi)005:740: gi cig gi bye ma snyed la byang chub tu
NK050(wi)005:741: sems bskyed na dus ngan gyis tshe chos 'di la
NK050(wi)005:742: mi bskur cing mos par 'gyur ba dang /
NK050(wi)005:743: sangs rgyas gang g+aa'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed
NK050(wi)005:744: la sems bskyed na dus ngan gyi tshe mdo 'di
NK050(wi)005:745: 'dzin 'chang klog 'don byed cing gzhan la yang glegs
NK050(wi)005:747: 'dzin 'chang klog par bskul zhing don yang ston nus pa sogs rgya cher gsungs so //
NK050(wi)005:750: bde gshegs snying po'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis kyang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur na /
NK050(wi)005:751: dad cing gus pa dang mngon du byas nas bsgoms pa lta ci smos /
NK050(wi)005:753: mkhas pa snying rje dang ldan pa rnams kyis rang
NK050(wi)005:754: gi srog la sogs pa dor nas kyang bstan par
NK050(wi)005:755: bya ba dang / thar pa don du gnyer ba
NK050(wi)005:756: rnams kyis me'i 'obs chen po las 'bogs nas kyang
NK050(wi)005:758: zhes gdams par mdzad pa nyid snying gi thig ler bcang bar bya'o //
NK050(wi)005:760: kun mkhyen sgrol ba'i mgon po yan chad gzhan stong brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs ltar la /
NK050(wi)005:761: rje btsun nas rgyal tshab snar thang ba /
NK050(wi)005:768: byams mgon rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas /
NK050(wi)005:769: pad+ma nyin byed dbang po'i mdun nas /
NK050(wi)005:770: rje bcu gsum pa'i lta khrid yig cha'i steng nas
NK050(wi)005:771: byin rlabs kyi rgyun bzang dang dus kyi 'khor lo'i
NK050(wi)005:772: smin grol brtsal zhing brgyud tshul rnam dag gzhan pa'ang
NK050(wi)005:773: yod do // zab mo'i lta ba gsung rab kyi //
NK050(wi)005:774: nges don lags mod rtogs pa nyung //
NK050(wi)005:775: rgyal tshab byams par 'khrul med pas //
NK050(wi)005:776: theg chen rgyud blar 'chad nyan mdzod //
NK050(wi)005:777: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyams len gyi //
NK050(wi)005:778: mthar thug yin kyang bsgom pa dkon //
NK050(wi)005:779: rgyud kyi rgyal por yid ches pas //
NK050(wi)005:780: dman la 'gram chu mi ldang mdzod //
NK050(wi)005:781: kun bzang spyod pa gegs chung la //
NK050(wi)005:782: sa chod che yang tshul ldan dka' //
NK050(wi)005:783: gong ma'i rnam thar dpang btsugs te //
NK050(wi)005:784: so byang bslab pas legs bsdams 'tshal //
NK050(wi)005:785: lta sgom spyod pa rnam dag na //
NK050(wi)005:788: bka' dang bstan bcos dgongs pa'i bcud //
NK050(wi)005:789: dge bas bdag dang sems can kun //
NK050(wi)005:790: nyes pa chen po lnga spangs shing //
NK050(wi)005:791: yon tan chen po lnga thob nas //
NK050(wi)005:792: don dam chos dbyings mngon gyur shog /
NK050(wi)005:793: ces pa 'di dpal ldan jo nang pa'i bstan 'dzin
NK050(wi)005:794: mkhas grub ngag dbang mtshan can zung gi thugs bzhed
NK050(wi)005:795: ltar / stong gzhi bde gshegs snying po la shes
NK050(wi)005:796: nas dad pa thob pa snyom las kyi btsun pa
NK050(wi)005:797: yon tan rgya mtshos dpal dzam thang gi chos grwa
NK050(wi)005:798: chen por bris pa skye ba kun tu nges don
NK050(wi)005:799: snying po'i bstan pa la thos bsam sgom pa'i skal
